content:
Direct Billing and Auto Pay

Policyholder, agents, and admin users can set up either direct billing or auto pay for their insurance premiums. 

The direct billing and auto pay OmniScript are available in the OmniStudio OmniScript Designer.

Here's what's in OmniScript:

* getPolicyDetails: Retrieves data from InsPolicy and Policy.
* getAccountInformation: Extracts data from Account and converts it to JSON output.
* billingOptionsSetUp: Displays the form for the user to select a billing option.
* billMethod: Displays the form for the user to select a payment method.
* setUpPaymentMethods: Displays the form for the user to enter more information about the payment method.
* createPaymentMethod: Takes the user data and assigns it to fields in setUpPaymentMethods.
* createBillingAccountAutoPay: If the user selected Auto pay, this component takes the user data and assigns it to fields in billMethod and setUpPaymentMode.
* createBillingAccountDirectBill: If the user selected direct billing, this component takes the user data and assigns it to fields in billMethod and setUpPaymentMode.
* updatePolicyBillingDetails: Assigns values to the payment due date and frequency.
* transformForConfirmation: Retrieves details from policydetails and converts it to JSON to be displayed in the confirmation FlexCard.
* confirmationStep: Displays a payment confirmation message to the user.

Set Up Direct Billing
Policyholders, agents, and admin users can set up direct billing from the Lex Console.

Set Up Auto Pay
Policyholders, agents, and admin users can set up automatic payments from the Lex Console.
title: Direct Billing and Auto Pay in Insurance
